comment.author: 13175590@N00
comment._content:
How many shy and demure ladies lined up at the sign 'Reserved ladies'?
AFAIK I have had breakfast at this one.  By the 1960s, it wasn't in the league of the majors: no full bacon & eggs style, but matched a few minors: baked beans on toast style.

Roderick B Smith
Rail News Victoria Editor
